CHAT.comment: Teaching. This is not the child's mother. It is the mother's sister. The child has been left in the sister's custody for 2 months. The sister reports the child was not talking at all before she took custody. The sister is referred to as Mother. Mother and Child sit on floor. First Mother teaches Child to string beads. Then Mother teaches Child to sort black and white buttons. Child is fairly intelligible.

u.a: starts to put bead in box .
lays string down on leg; intonation is whining .
Father has told Mother to show Child how; Mother hands string to Child .
points to end of string through bead .
points to string; helps Child hold end of string stiff .
holds out end of string for Child to put bead on .
takes string and puts bead on end of string .
puts black buttons in a box; experimenter has demonstrated task to Mother .
puts white button in box with black .
points to black buttons in box .
tries to put a button in the box Mother is holding .
puts white button in box for white .
puts black button in box for white .
removes black button from box for white .
puts black button in box for black .
starts to put button in wrong box .
gazes in box with white buttons .
puts black button in box for white .
puts black button in box for black .
puts white button box for black .
takes white out of black and puts in white .
